I have enjoyed this game ever since I joined Steam back in the beginning of 2019. It's a super fun game that can be played by anyone; just one complaint. It will not run very well on potatoes. It's understandably because it's a very graphic heavy game and I am planning on getting a new gaming computer in the near future. Until then... all in all, definitely a yes because it is too fun to resist not playing it more than once. A feel of nostalgia.
This game is one of the best made by valve

Причины купить эту игру:
- отличная графика при низких требованиях
- хороший юмор 
- подколы на столько остры, что о них можно порезаться
- можно играть с другом и наконец таки доказать ему, что ты гигант мысли
- это можно будет доказать, даже если он не купит игру
- турели просто прелесть, они даже умеют петь!
- игра с пространственным мышлением
- кул стори 
- персонажи на столько хороши, что заставляют верить в себя, даже если ты их никогда не увидишь
- [spoiler] самый лучший опыт общения с картофелем [/spoiler]

Причины НЕ купить эту игру:
- низкий [strike] интеллект [/strike] баланс на карте
después de 26 horas y tener todos los logros, puedo decir que si, se pasó bien ese día

The mechanics were good, and I loved how the frames looked if you spun like crazy (because you have a "little" bit of serious brain damage). The story line was also amazing, though some of the parts were a little tricky, but that's what made it so fun,as well as the time it took to complete it, since I, personally, hate short games.

Графика 7/10

as someone who thought they had seen the entire game already from walkthroughs, i am damn positively surprised how much more there is... Gameplay is super fun, amazing character development, fun and a bit deep lore, etc i would definitely recommend playing it!!! also very good game for very affordable price!  
(i have only played/finished the main story so far and have yet to take a look at coop or community test chambers...)

Absolutely garbage of a game. I buy it expecting some portal 1 action but no? the game is completely changed! And what is this challenge mode? does anybody even play this? whats the point of playing a game if you are going to try and finish it as fast as possible? and better yet compete with others. SOOOO boring and  ruins all the fun. I do not recommend unless you are a no lifer than doesn't touch grass thank you for reading my review.

Literally about to ctrl-c ctrl-v my review of Portal 1 (With some minor differences); Amazing game! Even more amazing story then Portal 1, experienced no bugs so far (I say "So far" because i have not beat Portal 2 yet, I'm on chapter 6: The Fall), I would 100% pay full price for this (£7.19 is a bargain for the amount of content you get!), I got this as a bundle with Portal 1 for £10.49. Great game (P.S., I do enjoy eating....Wheat bread).
